# Interface LLMChatRequestBuilderNodeExecutionConfig

Configuration for executing LLM chat request builder nodes

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "LLMChatRequestBuilderNodeExecutionConfig".

interface LLMChatRequestBuilderNodeExecutionConfig {  
messages?: [MessageTemplate](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.MessageTemplate)[];  
report_to_client?: string | boolean;  
response_format?: "text" | "json" | "json_schema";  
tool_choice?:  
| { type?: "string"; [k: string]: unknown }  
| { type?: "function"; [k: string]: unknown };  
tools?: [Tool](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Tool)[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

messages? report_to_client? response_format? tool_choice? tools?

## Properties

### `Optional`messages

messages?: [MessageTemplate](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.MessageTemplate)[]

List of message templates for the chat

### `Optional`report_to_client

report_to_client?: string | boolean

Whether to report node execution result to the client

### `Optional`response_format

response_format?: "text" | "json" | "json_schema"

Format that the model must output. Defaults to text.

### `Optional`tool_choice

tool_choice?:  
| { type?: "string"; [k: string]: unknown }  
| { type?: "function"; [k: string]: unknown }

Controls which tool is called by the model

### `Optional`tools

tools?: [Tool](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Tool)[]

List of tools available for function calling
